name: Hordiaz
description:
Hordiaz is a survivor / rpg where the player enjoys an immersive experience
in a medieval world, with the total freedom of the open and dynamic world.
Featuring superb gameplay and stylized graphics makes your world rich to explore.
As you try to survive in this world, Hordiaz dares to be different. Crossing stories
in time to continue his journey, to become a legend.

The world is divided into 2 factions:

  • Alliance: Union of the kingdoms of Humans, Dwarves and Holy elves.
  • Scourge: Union of the races: Undead , Demons and Shadow elves.


Key features:

  • Progress your character taking care of your 7 needs:hunger, thirst, toilet, hygiene, sleep, happiness and health.
  • Crafting mechanics
  • Shop System.
  • Bank System.
  • Quest System.
  • FriendShip System.
  • Mining and refining of ores.
  • Food cooking.
  • World day-night cycle.
